cons: Excessive peanuts intake may lead to gas, heartburn, and a suddenly developed food allergy to peanuts.
description: Peanuts contain vitamins, minerals, nutrients and anti-oxidants and thus are rich energy sources.It lowers bad cholesterol and increases good cholesterol in the body.
Peanuts contain mono-unsaturated fatty acids especially oleic acid that prevents coronary diseases.
Peanuts contain anti-oxidants in high concentrations. These anti-oxidants become more active when peanuts are boiled.
Vitamin E in peanuts helps in maintaining the integrity of cells of mucous membrane and the skin. This protects them from free radicals which cause great damage.
name: Peanuts
pros: Peanuts contain vitamins, minerals, nutrients and anti-oxidants and thus are rich energy sources.It lowers bad cholesterol and increases good cholesterol in the body.
Peanuts contain mono-unsaturated fatty acids especially oleic acid that prevents coronary diseases.
Peanuts contain anti-oxidants in high concentrations. These anti-oxidants become more active when peanuts are boiled.
Vitamin E in peanuts helps in maintaining the integrity of cells of mucous membrane and the skin. This protects them from free radicals which cause great damage.
A good source of folate, peanuts reduce the incidence of birth defects, and anemia related conditions.
Peanuts are safe in pregnancy, unless you're allergic to them or a health professional advises you not to.
